long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Mountain Quotes: Find Strength and Inspiration in Every Peak

Embrace the Power of Nature:
•	Soar to new heights with stunning high-resolution mountain wallpapers, capturing the majesty and tranquility of nature's giants. From snow-capped peaks to lush valleys, find a landscape that speaks to your soul.
•	Unleash your inner explorer with motivational quotes about perseverance, courage, and the power to overcome challenges. Every new tab is an opportunity to find inspiration and set your sights on the summit.
Focus and Efficiency:
•	Stay on track with a clean and uncluttered interface that keeps your browsing experience streamlined.
•	Quick access to your most visited sites allows you to jump right into your tasks without distractions.
Modern Convenience:
•	Up-to-date weather and date displayed on your new tab keeps you informed and prepared for the day ahead.
More Than Just an Extension:
•	Mountain Quotes is your daily dose of motivation and a reminder that even the most daunting goals can be achieved with focus and determination. Surround yourself with the beauty and power of nature and be inspired to reach your full potential.
Bing-powered Search:

Enhance your online exploration with the beauty of Bing. Mountain Quotes includes a search bar powered by Bing, so you can easily search for anything without leaving your new tab.

Key Features:
+ Stunning mountain and nature landscapes wallpapers
+ Quick access to your most visited websites
+ Save your most liked wallpapers 
+ Web Search with Bing
+ Display the current weather, time and date for added convenience
+ Show your frequently visited websites as shortcuts for faster browsing experiences

Install Mountain Quotes today and let the mountains guide you to greatness!
